opencpn-plugin.name: bsb4
opencpn-plugin.summary: OpenCPN support for BSB4 raster charts
opencpn-plugin.author: David S Register
opencpn-plugin.description: BSB4 plugin for OpenCPN provides support of BSB Version 4 Raster charts, the format used by many hydrographic authorities throughout the world. Supported charts must have been installed with appropriate encryption certificates in place.
